testcase.failure:
Scenario: -User Login through New York Realm with wrong username and password
Given I have an open web browser Then I am on the Realm selection page Then I select "4cb026a0-73be-4296-ad36-d9abf11e3757" When I login with "mario.sanc" and "mario.sanchez" Then I should be on the authentication failed page Then I should see "Authentication failed."
Message:
